pageContext.claim: “I call him Lying James Comey because he was a terrible liar, and he did a terrible job as the FBI director. Look at what happened with the Hillary Clinton and the e-mails and the Hillary Clinton investigation, one of the biggest screw-ups that anybody's ever seen as an investigation.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump disputes Comey's version of events, especially that the president pressed the former FBI director on a pledge of loyalty, but there is no evidence Comey lied about that incident. Comey kept detailed notes and told others about the conversation.
